title: What ever happened to the Palm Room at Wrightsville Beach close to Johnnie Mercer Pier?
text: I assume you mean after the nearby fire last week. The only building damaged in the fire was King's Beach Store, which was destroyed. The Palm Room was open Saturday, the day after the fire. Here's a link to our story about the damage left by the fire: http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20160430/ARTICLES/160439990/
